abstract: Marxist extremist group Revolutionary People's Liberation Party-Front claims responsibility for suicide attack in Istanbul that killed both an assailant and a police officer; incident marked second time in week that group has carried out attack against Turkish police as protest against governing Justice and Development Party.
lead_paragraph: The Revolutionary People’s Liberation Party-Front identified a female bomber who killed herself and a police officer in a popular tourist area.
snippet: The Revolutionary People’s Liberation Party-Front identified a female bomber who killed herself and a police officer in a popular tourist area.

headline.main: Extremist Group Claims Responsibility for Suicide Attack at Istanbul Police Station
headline.print_headline: Extremist Group Claims Responsibility for Suicide Attack at Istanbul Police Station
